mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subject LEFT JOIN course ON subject_course = course_id LEFT JOIN knowledge ON subject_knowledge = knowledge_id WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId}

SELECT a.subject_id,a.subject_score,a.subject_difficulty,a.subject_type,a.subject_describe,a.subject_answer FROM subject a LEFT JOIN paper_subject stag ON a.subject_id = stag.subject_id LEFT JOIN paper b ON stag.paper_id = b.paper_id WHERE b.paper_id = #{paperId}
